snippet: Ronald J. Binz, nominated to lead the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, is opposed by the coal industry because of his efforts to promote renewable energy.
abstract: Ronald J Binz, nominated to lead the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, is opposed by the coal industry because of his efforts to promote renewable energy; fight over Binz has been unusually public.
lead_paragraph: Ronald J. Binz, nominated to lead the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, is opposed by the coal industry because of his efforts to promote renewable energy.

headline.main: An Unusual Public Battle Over an Energy Nomination
headline.print_headline: An Energy Nomination Leads to a Public Battle
